* Contact: HeikkiPaajanen
* Make: Acer
* Brand: Aspire
* Model: 5310
* Website: http://global.acer.com/products/notebook/as5310.htm

=== Current Issues ===
* WLAN is not working with madwifi nor ndiswrapper
** 05:00.0 Ethernet controller: Atheros Communications, Inc. AR5006EG 802.11 b/g Wireless PCI Express Adapter (rev 01)
* Sound card (or actually Realtek Codec ALC268) is not supported with alsa version (1.0.14) in Gutsy. Works with 1.0.15

=== System Info ===
<pre>
$ sudo dmidecode -s system-manufacturer
Acer
$ sudo dmidecode -s system-product-name
Aspire 5310
$ sudo dmidecode -s system-version
V1.50
</pre>
